title: Simple Calculator
description: A project created to practice and learn modern programming languages by developing a functional calculator app.

title: Simple ToDo List
description: The Simple To-Do List is a basic app that helps users add, view and delete daily tasks. It is easy to use and helps keep tasks organized in one place.

title: Library Management System Java
description: A Java-based console application designed to manage library operations like adding, borrowing, and returning books.

title: conference system
description: A system to organize and manage conferences, including scheduling sessions, speakers, and attendees.

title: Login page
description: The Login Page allows users to securely access the application by entering their username and password. It ensures that only authorized users can use the system.

title: Smart Garment Tracking and Optimization System
description: The Smart Garment Tracking and Optimization System enables garment factories to monitor production progress in real time using RFID technology, track employee productivity, manage quality defects, and generate analytical reports. The system helps improve operational efficiency, reduce delays, and support data-driven decision making.

title: Personal Expense Tracker
description: A full-stack web app to record, categorize, and analyze daily expenses with dashboards, filters, and customizable settings for better budgeting and spending insights.

title: Age Calculator
description: A responsive React app that calculates a person's exact age in years, months, and days from their date of birth, with form validation and a clean, user-friendly interface.
